alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:47AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lake, Mason and northern Oceana Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1046 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Silver Lake SP, or 15 miles southwest of Ludington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ludington... Baldwin... Ludington SP... Scottville... Pentwater... Luther... Fountain... Free Soil... Hamlin Lake... Mears SP... Weare... Custer... Nirvana... Wolf Lake... Idlewild... Irons... Walhalla... Crystal Valley... Sauble Lakes... Big Star Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
